org.mini2Dx.core.font

Interface MonospaceGameFont.FontRenderListener

  • Enclosing class:
    MonospaceGameFont

    public static interface MonospaceGameFont.FontRenderListener

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void postRenderChar(Graphics g, char c, float charRenderX, float charRenderY, float charRenderWidth, float charRenderHeight)
      Called after rendering a character to screen.
      boolean preRenderChar(Graphics g, char c, float charRenderX, float charRenderY, float charRenderWidth, float charRenderHeight)
      Called before rendering a character to screen

    • Method Detail

      • preRenderChar

        boolean preRenderChar(Graphics g,
                      char c,
                      float charRenderX,
                      float charRenderY,
                      float charRenderWidth,
                      float charRenderHeight)
        Called before rendering a character to screen
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics context
        c - The text character to be rendered
        charRenderX - The x coordinate the character will render at
        charRenderY - The y coordinate the character will render at
        charRenderWidth - The frame width of the character
        charRenderHeight - The frame height of the character
        Returns:
        True if the character should be rendered, otherwise false

      • postRenderChar

        void postRenderChar(Graphics g,
                    char c,
                    float charRenderX,
                    float charRenderY,
                    float charRenderWidth,
                    float charRenderHeight)
        Called after rendering a character to screen.

        Note: If preRenderChar(Graphics, char, float, float, float, float) returns false, this method will still be called.
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics context
        c - The text character rendered
        charRenderX - The x coordinate the character was rendered at
        charRenderY - The y coordinate the character was rendered at
        charRenderWidth - The frame width of the character
        charRenderHeight - The frame height of the character
